teamMembers.name: Justice (Retd.) Ata-ur-Rahman
teamMembers.bio: Established the chamber in 1972. Remained an advocate of the High Court and Supreme Court of Pakistan. Served as a Senior Puisne Judge of the High Court of Sindh at Karachi. Involved as an advocate in landmark cases and is the author of numerous judgments. Currently practices as an Arbitrator, Commissioner, and Umpire.
expertise: Litigation (Advocate of High Court and Supreme Court)

education: Advocate of the High Court
Advocate of the Supreme Court of Pakistan
experience: Established Ata-ur-Rahman & Co. in 1972
Elevated to the bench on 27.05.1998
Retired on 17.07.2005 as a Senior Puisne Judge of the High Court of Sindh at Karachi
Practices as an Arbitrator, Commissioner, and Umpire

teamMembers.name: Obaid-ur-Rahman Khan
teamMembers.bio: Practicing advocate of the High Courts and Supreme Court of Pakistan. Has over 15 years of experience. Given the reins of the practice in 2009. Deals with matters in the Supreme Court, High Courts, District Courts, National Accountability Courts, Banking Courts, and Special Courts.

education: Bachelors in English Literature from University of Karachi
LL.B. from Hamdard School of Law, Hamdard University (with two gold medals)
Masters of Law (LL.M.) from the London School of Economics and Political Science
experience: Principal Litigator at Ata-ur-Rahman & Co.
Given the reins of the practice in 2009
Pupilage completed from the chambers of Mr. Khalid Anwer
Published dissertation on ‘International Law, Hostile Non-State Entities, The Scope of the Principle of Self Defense and Pakistan’
memberships: Enrolled advocate of the Supreme Court of Pakistan
Practicing advocate of the High Courts
appointments: Given the reins of the practice: 2009

teamMembers.name: Munawar Ali Bhaagat
teamMembers.bio: Practicing advocate of the High Courts of Pakistan. Joined the chambers of Ata-ur-Rahman & Co. in January 2018. Responsible for criminal trials at the firm. Also provides assistance to the civil practice.

education: Bachelors in English literature from Karachi University
LL.B. from Hamdard School of Law, Hamdard University
experience: Completed pupilage at the chambers of Mr. M A Kazi
Responsible for criminal trials at the firm
Joined Ata-ur-Rahman & Co. in January 2018
memberships: Practicing advocate of the High Courts of Pakistan

teamMembers.name: Noor Z. Khattak
teamMembers.bio: Practicing Advocate of the High Courts of Pakistan. Has more than 10 years of experience. Deals with all the District Court cases on behalf of the firm. Has expertise in the area of cross-examinations.

education: B.A L.L.B
experience: Associate at Ata-ur-Rahman & Co.
Deals with all District Court cases
Has more than 10 years of experience
memberships: Practicing Advocate of the High Courts of Pakistan

teamMembers.name: Muhammad Rehman
teamMembers.bio: Advocate of the High Courts. Assists in matters at the District Court level and the Superior Court.

education: B.A L.L.B from S.M Law College
experience: Associate at Ata-ur-Rahman & Co.
Assists in matters at the District Court level
Assists in matters at the Superior Court

teamMembers.name: Mudassir Abbasi
teamMembers.bio: Advocate of the High Court. Assists in matters at the District Court and superior Court. Represents clients in Service/Employment Law, Banking and NAB matters. Completed a Legal Practice Course and LLM focusing on commercial and banking law in the UK.

education: Bachelor in Commerce (B.Com) from University of Sindh
Diploma in Law from the University of London (2014)
LL.B. (Hons) from the University of London
Legal Practice Course (LPC) from the University of Law, Manchester
LLM from the University of Law, Manchester (focus on Commercial Law, Banking and Debt Finance, Public Companies Law, Mergers and Acquisitions)
experience: Advocate of the High Court
Worked as a paralegal in Law Lane Solicitors, London
Assists with drafting and research for civil and criminal matters
Represents clients in Service/Employment Law, Banking and NAB matters
Joined the practice again: 2018

teamMembers.name: Sabih Ahmed Zubairi
teamMembers.bio: Practicing advocate of the High Courts of Pakistan. Joined the office in December 2018. Has in-house and corporate legal experience from previous roles and internships. His practice includes commercial, civil, constitutional, criminal, and service matters.

education: LL.B. (Hons) from the University of London
Masters of Law (LL.M.) from the University of Law, Bristol (Focus on Comparative Constitutional Law, Equity and Debt Finance, Taxation and Commercial Law)
Post Graduate Diploma in Legal Practice from the University of Law, Bristol
experience: Joined Ata-ur-Rahman & Co. in December 2018
Associate legal affairs at KE
Completed pupilage from chambers of Mr. Makhdoom Ali Khan of Fazalghani Advocates
Worked as Associate in Mohammad Farogh Naseem & Co. Advocates
Worked as a paralegal in Mohsin Tayebaly & Co.
Reported case cited as SBLR 2020 Sindh 1677

teamMembers.name: Saleem Raza Jakhar
teamMembers.bio: Advocate of the High Court of Pakistan. Commenced his legal career in 2006. Regularly appears before District Courts and Superior Courts. Joined Ata-ur-Rahman & Co. in October 2023. Practice areas include civil, constitutional, criminal, and service law matters.

education: LL.B. from Shah Abdul Latif University, Khairpur (Mirs)
experience: Commenced legal career in 2006
Joined Ata-ur-Rahman & Co. in October 2023
Initial legal training under Justice (R) Aftab Ahmed Gorar
Gained further experience in the chambers of Mr. Muhammad Ashraff Kazi
memberships: Advocate of the High Court of Pakistan

teamMembers.name: Bahadur Jahangir Khoso
teamMembers.bio: Practicing Advocate of the High Courts of Pakistan. Called to the Bar of England and Wales in 2023. Joined the office in May 2024. Regularly appears before High Courts, District Courts and Special Tribunals. Focuses on advocacy, research, drafting, and preparing case law briefs.

education: Bachelor of Laws (LLB Hons) from the University of London
Bar-at-Law (Hon’ble Society of Lincoln’s Inn)
LL.M from BPP University, London
experience: Joined Ata-ur-Rahman & Co. in May 2024
Worked as an associate with Rizvi and Bukhari Associates
Focuses on advocacy, research, drafting, legal opinions, and preparing case law briefs
Appears before the High Courts, District Courts and Special Tribunals
memberships: Practicing Advocate of the High Courts of Pakistan
Lincoln’s Inn Society (Bar of England and Wales)
appointments: Called to the Bar of England and Wales: 2023
